sentences.en: Common tools include the trowel, penknife and brush.
sentences.cn: 常用的工具包括铲子、小刀以及刷子。

sentences.en: He told her that she was his favourite author and that she deserved the Nobel Prize for literature. He really laid it on with a trowel.
sentences.cn: 他对她说,她是自己最喜欢的作家,还说她应该获得诺贝尔文学奖. 他实际上是在恭维她.

sentences.en: Some of the grid sections will accumulate immediately in the trowel areas.
sentences.cn: 有些板栅碎块可能立即堆积在刮刀的地方.

sentences.en: That was laid on with a trowel.
With her trowel she turned the soil over and over, and smoothed and patted it firm.
sentences.cn: 她用泥铲把土翻了又翻, 又弄平,再拍结实.

sentences.en: With my spade and trowel, I'll dig his grave.
sentences.cn: 我将为它挖掘坟墓, 用我的凿子跟铲子.

trans.tran_en: a garden tool like a very small  spade
